name: Emperor's Resolution
description: Fontemer Aberrants are different from human beings in that the concepts of aristocracy or inheritance are entirely foreign to them. None of them are born superior. One that survives deadly predators and adversities is able to accumulate infinite power as it keeps hunting and feeding over centuries. Such a creature is often referred to as an overlord for the fear it inspires.
source: Dropped by Lv. 30+ Emperor of Fire and Iron
Dropped by Lv. 30+ Emperor of Fire and Iron
